text: John K. "Jack" Rafferty (May 1, 1938 â€“ February 17, 2021) was an American politician. He was the Mayor of Hamilton Township, New Jersey from 1976 to 1999. He also was a member of the New Jersey General Assembly from 1986 to 1988. He was a Republican. Rafferty was born in Trenton, New Jersey. Rafferty died on February 17, 2021 in Hamilton Township at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:American mayors Category:Politicians from Trenton, New Jersey Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: John K. Rafferty
